def merge_sorted_arrays(arr1, arr2):
    merged = []
    (i, j) = (0, 0)
    while i < len(arr1) or j < len(arr2):
        if arr1[i] < arr2[j]:
            merged.append(arr1[i])
            i += 1
        elif arr1[i] > arr2[j]:
            merged.append(arr2[j])
            j += 1
        else:
            merged.append(arr1[i])
            i += 1
            j += 1
    while i < len(arr1):
        merged.append(arr1[i])
        i += 1
    while j < len(arr2):
        merged.append(arr2[j])
        j += 1
    merged = list(set(merged))
    merged.sort()
    merged.reverse()
    return merged[:min(2 * len(arr1), len(merged))]

    while i < len(arr1):
        merged.append(arr1[i])
        i += 1

    merged.sort()

mutants.code:
def merge_sorted_arrays(arr1, arr2):
    merged = []
    (i, j) = (0, 0)
    while i < len(arr1) and j < len(arr2):
        if arr1[i] < arr2[j]:
            merged.append(arr1[i])
            i += 1
        elif arr1[i] > arr2[j]:
            merged.append(arr2[j])
            j += 1
        else:
            merged.append(arr1[i])
            i += 1
            j += 1
    while i < len(arr1):
        merged.append(arr1[i])
        i += 1
    while j < len(arr2):
        merged.append(arr2[j])
        j += 1
    merged = list(set(merged))
    merged.sort()
    merged.reverse()
    return merged[:min(-2 * len(arr1), len(merged))]
